location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from John Wedderburn, Accountant General and Civil Auditor, Public Department, Bombay to Captain William Bruce, Resident at Bushire

mods.abstract: The letter is confirming that disbursements for June to October 1817 have been approved, with the exception of the Resident's salary and describes in detail the accounting adjustments necessary to approve it.
